00035   // return tie-line for particular pressure and temperature indexes

00037     { return x_table + (i + j * (nPres+1) ) * nComps; }
00038   double *getY (int i, int j) 
00039     { return y_table + (i + j * (nPres+1) ) * nComps; }

00059   double get_MMP_T_interpolated (int it, double dt) 
00060   {
00061     if (nTemp==1)     // isothermal
00062       return MMP[it];
00063     return  (MMP[it-1] + dt * (MMP[it] - MMP[it-1]));
00064   };
